HOW WE SHARE AND DISCLOSE YOUR INFORMATION
If we receive a request for information, we may disclose Information if we reasonably believe disclosure is in accordance with or required by any applicable law, regulation or legal process.
Please note that we may need to retain certain information for record keeping purposes, to complete transactions or to comply with our legal obligations.
TABLE OF CONTENTS:

How we share and disclose your information
We collect information globally and primarily store that information in the United States.
We may transfer, process and store your information outside of your country of residence, to wherever we, flowres.io or our third-party service providers operate for the purpose of providing you the Services.
We use cookies or similar technologies to collect information, analyze trends, administer the website, and track users' movements around the website.
flowres.io may need to contact you for invoicing, account management and similar reasons and we use account data to administer accounts and keep track of billing and payments.
